### Example 1: For a detailed explanation of message enrichments in Azure IoT Hub, see https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/iot-hub/iot-hub-message-enrichments-overview (autogenerated)
```powershell
PS C:\> Set-AzIotHubMessageEnrichment -Endpoint endpoint1,endpoint2,endpoint3 -Key newKey -Name myiothub -ResourceGroupName myresourcegroup -Value updatedValue
```
